name: Zombie Solitaire 2 Chapter 1
description: The zombies are back! Play your solitaire cards right on your action-packed escape to survive! This game is 100% GMO FREE*.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
